title: Authorities identify man shot in turkey-hunting incident
content:
MADISON—A man killed while turkey hunting Sunday was identified Monday evening as David R. Tilton, 37, of Janesville.
Preliminary results of an autopsy completed Monday at the Dane County Medical Examiner's Department confirm Tilton died from “firearm-related trauma,” according to a news release from the Rock County Medical Examiner's Department.
Other testing is underway, according to the release.
An accidental shooting was reported Sunday morning in the 2100 block of Lima Center Road in the town of Johnstown. It remains under investigation, according to the release.
